units.title: Chemical Sciences — AC9S9U04 — Chemical processes & radioactivity
units.whyThis: This activity introduces Chemical Sciences at a level that suits you.

units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S8U01 — Cells and systems
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Biological Sciences, so this Y8 activity is the next step to extend it.

units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S8U02 — Plate tectonics
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Earth & Space Sciences, so this Y8 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Arborist (Science-focused)
careers.whyThis: Arborist (Science-focused) uses the Earth & Space Sciences you’ve already been learning. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Arborist (Science-focused) involves.
